channel.title: Keith Harris on
channel.description: Recent content in Keith Harris on

item.title: Reports â€“ Harris has recommended a bidder to Ashley
item.description: Will we ever be sold is the question being asked every day of the week from Newcastle fans, and you yourself may begin to wonder if Mike Ashley will depart from St.James Park anytime soon. However the latest reports are, that Keith Harris, who is working on the Newcastle sale on Seymour Pierce’s behalf, has recommended a bidder to Ashley and it’s up to Mike to accept or reject. How true these reports are , we don’t know but if everything went to plan, Keith Harris would’ve reported back to Ashley yesterday evening.
